name: Ride In The Midnight
description: A dark theme for WWT... This is a full theme, unlike the Dark BG userstyle which only changes the background, so you might want to consider using this.
obsoletion_message: Just hidden for the time being
additional_info: Current Version: V1.0.4 /* Change Log */ v1.0.1 (26-02-2017) 1. Fixed the 'Legend' background color. 2. Fixed the forum category background color. - v1.0.2 (27-02-2017) 1. Fixed button colors on a Torrent Detail page. 2. Fixed hover colors on a Torrent Detail page. 3. Fixed font-size under the 'Friendly Site' column. - v1.0.3 (01-03-2017) 1. Fixed the preview "quote" text color.. - v1.0.4 (06-03-2017) 1. Added ability to change the main background color to whatever you want! 2. Added ability to change the navigation color to whatever you want! 3. Added ability to hide/show the index page WWT banner. 4. Added a white shadow whenever you hover on a profile pic on the profile page. - v1.0.5 (26-03-2017 / 28-03-2017) 1. Fixed some blue colors which weren't visible properly 2. Remove the underlines from usernames in the shoutbox. 3. Fixed banner settings. PM me here if you have feedback/suggestions.
